channel.title: Can somone point me in the right direction?
channel.description: what is a good thing to start off with when learning Delphi 7 (SE)? and or what good sites will help me and btw i have googled it but there not very informative.

item.title: Can somone point me in the right direction?
item.dc:creator: @Criptic Criptic
item.description:
@Criptic wrote:

im going to learn Delphi first (found this site http://forums.devshed.com/delphi-programming-90/ ) then Java then Vb or Vb then Java

Read full topic
item.source: Can somone point me in the right direction?

item.title: Can somone point me in the right direction?
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

Well, if you are very ambitious I’d recommend starting with Java, but that’s a bit biased because that’s what I started with. VB is an okay starting language but if you find the tutorials for Delphi then learn that because that is what you want to do, whereas if you try to learn something you aren’t interested in you will lose your ambition to learn it.

Read full topic
item.source: Can somone point me in the right direction?

item.title: Can somone point me in the right direction?
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

Writing a programming language isn’t a walk in the park (I’ve never attempted it myself, mind). Seriously, the best idea is to learn a few different languages before you start. Get used to different concepts of programming.

Read full topic
item.source: Can somone point me in the right direction?

item.title: Can somone point me in the right direction?
item.dc:creator: @Criptic Criptic
item.description:
@Criptic wrote:

Mr.Chris:

You don’t have to use Delphi to code your own language, if that’s truly what you want to do…

true but thats what freddy wrote Scar in and what else could i write it in that is easy?

Read full topic

item.title: Can somone point me in the right direction?
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

Criptic:

VB i have allready tryed that and i then i just gave up because it was soooo annoying because some of the tools wouldnt work and btw do you think Freddy will give me anyhelp? i was thinking of asking

He’s a friendly guy, but he’s always busy. Try reading tutorials. You don’t have to use Delphi to code your own language, if that’s truly what you want to do…

http://www.hypernews.org/HyperNews/get/computers/languages/59.html
http://www.thescripts.com/forum/thread274654.html
http://www.devincook.com/goldparser/

http://www.google.co.uk/search?hl=en&safe=off&q=making+own+programming+language&btnG=Search&meta=

Read full topic
